scripts.build: bun run build:mac && bun run build:ubuntu
scripts.build:mac: mkdir -p dist/mac dist/mac-arm && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/mac/dotfiles && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/mac-arm/dotfiles
scripts.build:ubuntu: mkdir -p dist/ubuntu dist/ubuntu-arm && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/ubuntu/dotfiles && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/ubuntu-arm/dotfiles
scripts.build:local: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify src/cli.ts --outfile dist/dotfiles
